description: At 6'6? and 232 pounds of muscle, Rio is one tall drink of straight man. What four years of playing professional soccer have done to his body is very evident. The effects on his libido quickly showed up as well in the form of a mighty tent in his pants.He was a little shy at first but as soon his clothes came off, that dick came up and he was pounding away like the champion he is. title: The Athletic Supporter, Scene #01
